name: campus-canteen-food-hub
description: MEAN Stack Food Ordering Application for Campus Canteen

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client-user && npm install && cd ../client-admin && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:user && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:user && npm run test:admin
